## PreflightTest.addListener() method

Failed event. Raised when the PreflightTest was unable to be performed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addListener(failedEvent: PreflightTest.Event.Failed, listener: PreflightTest.Listener.Failed): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  failedEvent | [PreflightTest.Event.Failed](./voice-react-native-sdk.preflighttest_namespace.event_enum.md) | The raised event string. |
|  listener | [PreflightTest.Listener.Failed](./voice-react-native-sdk.preflighttest_namespace.listener_namespace.failed_typealias.md) | A listener function that will be invoked when the event is raised. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

- The PreflightTest object.

## Example


```typescript
preflightTest.addListener(PreflightTest.Event.Failed, (error: TwilioError) => {
  // preflightTest has failed
  // consider adjusting your UI to show the error
});
```
